<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Nucol](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1281)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Representing the fear of parasites and affliction, nucols appear as violent, pestilence-ridden boars. They pollute their victim's body and mind, spreading not only fear but a mind-altering affliction that exacerbates feelings of self-doubt.

 Though very aggressive, the fiends are capable of cunning manipulation. After they infect a victim with potent insecurity, they'll offer to remove the affliction for a price. Many of these deals are esoteric in nature, driving the victim into despair and forcing them to give up things they cherish. The sinister nucol may even reinfect its victim after completing the bargain, but a canny negotiator may be able to turn the tables on the fiend and free themselves from its grasp.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Sahkil_Nucol.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Nucol](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1281)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Sahkil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=333" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 219</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 100 feet

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 60 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Easy to Call** A sahkil's level is considered 2 lower for the purpose of being conjured by the [_planar binding_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17) ritual (and potentially other rituals, at the GM's discretion), but it is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68)

**Resistances**
poison 5

**Weaknesses**
good 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tusk +12 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d4 evil and nervous consumption

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 20
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177)
- **1st**
[Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140) (×3)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251)

**Nervous Consumption**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Stage 1** [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 day); **Stage 2** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and stupefied 2 (1 day); **Stage 3** clumsy 2 and stupefied 3 (1 day)

**Skip Between** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) The sahkil moves from the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) to the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9) or vice-versa, with the effects of [_ethereal jaunt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=105) except that the effect has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed. A summoned sahkil can't use Skip Between.

**Spray Pus** <actions string="Single Action" />  The nucol flexes one of its infected wounds, releasing a spray of pus in a 15- foot cone or targeting an individual creature within 30 feet. A creature targeted or in the area is exposed to nervous consumption.

</column>
